modName: Knowledge Is Power - The Biography of Sebius Tyrannus
summary: An original story and text based quest to uncover the hidden treasures of Sebius Tyrannus
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#1e84cc][size=4][/size][/color][/center][center][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Description [/size][/color]

This is a text based Story, Quest and Treasure hunt. Designed with simplicity in mind
The story charts the life of Sebius Tyrannus and a secret collection of tomes he has hidden from mortal beings

The quest contains no scripted events, meaning no quest markers or quest logging.  
The quest is progressed by following the written clues and using items provided.[/center][center]
[color=#ff0000] 
*** This story is started by finding the message placed in the Tower at Dragontooth Crater ***[/color]

[color=#ffff00]See Video Below For Guide If Needed[/color]
[size=4]
Cleaned with TES5EDIT[/size]

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Requires[/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000]Dawnguard and Dragonborn

Progress in Dawnguard is needed to progress this story
Note: It does not matter if Dawnguard is already complete[/color]

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Features[/size][/color]

4 Story based books to discover spanning around 2500 words
18 New skill books
Loot to sell or keep

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Installation / Uninstall[/size][/color]

Install with Nexus Mod Manager

Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager

Thanks to the scriptless nature of this mod, it safe to remove at any time if desired.

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Permissions[/size][/color]
[i][color=#ff0000]
None of these original works can be edited or uploaded as a published mod

Offers to translate this mod will be considered


[/color][/i][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Quest Guide Video[/size]

[youtube]TO_QvdZ-XZ4[/youtube]

[b][size=5]
[/size][/b][/color][b][size=5]GAMING, GADGETS AND ENTERTAINMENT[/size][/b]

[size=5][url=http://WWW.WHITENOISE-ONLINE.CO.UK]WWW.WHITENOISE-ONLINE.CO.UK[/url][/size][/center]
